response.overview: When their bands have trouble, Fat Cherry Records calls for Peter Greene. Well paid, striding with the big guys, enjoying power in the fame-hungry rock world, Peter lives life on the A Side. But sometimes his spin-master talents clash with his kindred moral code, and he feels a nagging sense of unease. Still, he is the head CYA -- and he likes it on the A Side. And then he meets Nina. She needs a good man to do a dirty job. In a shockingly short time, well-ordered Peter degenerates into an unsavory man compulsively in love and tied-in with the Irish mob. His life in chaos, he crashes onto the B Side. His moment of truth comes in London where he faces a life-threatening decision: redemption or death. Peter maneuvers to once again become the spin-master...but will he survive?
response.title: Lost on the B Side
